SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT CUSTOMER_ID as "cusId", CUSTOMER_NAME as "cusNm", CUSTOMER_AUTONO as "autoNo", CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND as "autoKind", FN_CODENAME(CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND, 'KIND') kind, CUSTOMER_TEL as "cusTel", USE_YN as "useYN", NOTE as "note", AUTOINT as "autoInt", KILRO_TOTAL as "totalKm" FROM CAR_CUSTOMER WHERE 1=1
